title: Trouble brews on and off the road for Ineos Grenadiers after early Vuelta a España losses
content:
Geraint Thomas 'legless' in first summit finish, Thymen Arensman loses time as team scrambles to fill GC void for 2024.

Read the full article at Trouble brews on and off the road for Ineos Grenadiers after early Vuelta a España losses on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
